items.description: ConstrainedValue is an alias for temporal's dynamicconfig.ConstrainedValue.

constraints.description: Constraints describe under what conditions a ConstrainedValue should be used.

value.description:
Value is the value for the configuration key.
The type of the Value field depends on the key.
Acceptable types will be one of: int, float64, bool, string, map[string]any, time.Duration

items.description: SecretKeySelector selects a key of a Secret.

key.description: The key of the secret to select from.  Must be a valid secret key.

name.description:
Name of the referent.
This field is effectively required, but due to backwards compatibility is
allowed to be empty. Instances of this type with an empty value here are
almost certainly wrong.
More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/overview/working-with-objects/names/#names

optional.description: Specify whether the Secret or its key must be defined
